item.title: Hong Kong Professor in Food & Nutritional Sciences Appointed to the Herbalife Nutrition Advisory Board
item.description: HONG KONG--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Herbalife, a global nutrition company, today announced that Dr. Zhen-Yu Chen, an expert in food and nutritional sciences has been appointed to its Nutrition Advisory Board (NAB).

item.title: E Ink Launches World’s Largest Electronic Paper Display at CES 2017
item.description: LAS VEGAS--(BUSINESS WIRE)--E Ink® Holdings, "E Ink" (8069.TW), the leading innovator of electronic ink technology in the world, today announced the debut of its 42” display, the largest commercially available active matrix ePaper module. The 42” display will meet the growing demand for large area displays across the digital signage market. This is the latest addition to the E Ink Pearl™ product line of ePaper displays. item.title: Augmented Reality Solution Group Maxst Unveils New AR Products at CES 2017
item.description: SEOUL, South Korea--(BUSINESS WIRE)--#AR--Augmented Reality Solution Group Maxst will showcase new AR products at CES 2017. VIVAR, the AR based video call platform and Revelio, AR smart glasses will be unveiled.

item.title: Fraunhofer Announces MPEG-H Trademark to Identify Interoperable Products
item.description: ERLANGEN, Germany & LAS VEGAS--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Fraunhofer IIS has developed a trademark program for products incorporating its MPEG-H TV Audio System.

item.title: BestWeek Ranks UnitedHealth Group and AXA as the World’s Largest Insurers
item.description: OLDWICK, N.J.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--UnitedHealth Group Incorporated took the top spot in A.M. Best’s ranking of the world’s 25 largest insurance companies, as measured by 2015 net premiums written (NPW). AXA S.A. kept its top spot by assets, and was ranked at No. 2 by NPW. Allianz SE was ranked No. 2 by assets. The rankings of the world’s largest global insurance companies, by assets and NPW, were released by A.M. Best in the Jan. 2, 2017, issue of BestWeek. item.description: BOSTON--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Brightcove, Inc. (NASDAQ: BCOV), a leading provider of cloud services for video, and Evergent Technologies announced a global partnership to accelerate the delivery and monetization of OTT and IPTV video services for broadcasters, operators and telcos looking to tap into the growing direct-to-consumer market opportunity for premium content. item.title: Viptela Selected by Pakistan Telecommunication Company Limited (PTCL) to Deliver Software-Defined WANs
item.description: SAN JOSE, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--#NFV--SD-WAN leader Viptela and Inbox, the leading provider of digital services in Pakistan, have signed the Pakistan Telecommunication Company Limited (PTCL) as their first joint customer.

item.title: Xoom Expands Reach in Asia with Fast Bank Deposit Service to Japan
item.description: SAN FRANCISCO--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Xoom, a leading digital money transfer provider, today announced it will be expanding its service in Asia with a fast bank deposit service to Japan.

item.title: Azure Power Commissions Largest Solar Power Project (150MW) in North India
item.description: NEW DELHI--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Azure Power announced that it has commissioned the largest (150 MW) solar power project in north India, in the state of Punjab in December 2016.

item.title: Garmin® expands integrated driving recording technology with auto manufacturer Dongfeng Peugeot-Citroën
item.description: OLATHE, Kan.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Garmin International Inc., a unit of Garmin Ltd. (NASDAQ: GRMN), today announced the expansion of its sophisticated intelligent driving video recorder (IDVR) technology with Chinese automobile manufacturing partner Dongfeng Peugeot-Citroën Automobile Limited (DPCA). Garmin first introduced its IDVR program solution with the Peugeot 3008 car model and this announcement now adds the recently-announced Dongfeng Citroën C4L car model to the exclusive list. item.title: BIT Group Opens IVD-Focused Contract Manufacturing Facility in China
item.description: SCHWALBACH, Germany--(BUSINESS WIRE)--BIT Group has officially opened EMD Shenzhen, Ltd. – a comprehensive IVD instrumentation & hematology reagent contract manufacturing operation in Shenzhen, China.

item.title: MetLife Hong Kong Wins Eight Awards at BENCHMARK Wealth Management Awards 2016
item.description: HONG KONG--(BUSINESS WIRE)--MetLife Hong Kong*, a wholly-owned subsidiary of MetLife, Inc., the #1 U.S. life insurer^, continued its winning streak at the BENCHMARK Wealth Management Awards this year by winning in eight categories, including both Brand of the Year and Best-in-Class Digital Marketing for the second consecutive year. MetLife Hong Kong has won 23 BENCHMARK awards since 2014. As one of the most esteemed industry awards in Hong Kong, the annual BENCHMARK Wealth Management Awards rec

item.title: Hong Kong Investor Unveils Australia’s First Six-Star Beachfront Hotel
item.description: SURFERS PARADISE, Australia--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Investment group Aquis Australia has unveiled plans for a new $AUD440 million luxury hotel on a prime beachfront position in the tourist mecca of Surfers Paradise, Queensland, Australia. The 48-level complex will include 580 hotel rooms and suites as well as the Gold Coast’s premier dining and entertainment facilities. A Development Application has been lodged with local authorities. It is the only new, large-scale hotel currently planned for south–
